items.title: Organic Linen Throw Pillow - Natural
items.description: Handwoven organic linen pillow in natural cream. Perfect for adding texture and warmth to any space. 20" x 20" with down insert.

items.title: Brass Arc Floor Lamp
items.description: Elegant arching floor lamp with brushed brass finish and adjustable height. Creates beautiful ambient lighting with a warm glow.

items.title: Handwoven Jute Area Rug
items.description: Natural jute rug with chunky weave. Durable and sustainable, perfect for high-traffic areas. Available in multiple sizes.

items.title: Ceramic Planter Set - Terracotta
items.description: Set of three handmade ceramic planters in warm terracotta. Each piece is unique. Drainage holes included.

items.title: Rattan Pendant Light Fixture
items.description: Natural rattan woven pendant light. Adds organic texture and creates beautiful shadow patterns. Hardwired installation.

items.title: White Oak Coffee Table
items.description: Minimalist coffee table in solid white oak with clean lines and natural finish. Handcrafted with attention to detail.

items.title: Chunky Knit Throw Blanket - Cream
items.description: Oversized chunky knit throw in soft cream merino wool. Adds instant coziness to any sofa or bed. Machine washable.

items.title: Vintage-Style Brass Mirror
items.description: Round wall mirror with brushed brass frame. Vintage-inspired design that works in both traditional and contemporary spaces.

items.title: Woven Storage Basket Set
items.description: Set of three natural seagrass baskets in graduated sizes. Perfect for organizing while maintaining a beautiful aesthetic.
